name: DALI Firmware Image
summary: A D2FW file is a firmware update used by an IEC 62386-105 compliant lighting control gear or control device. It contains data used to fix a bug or add features to the device's current firmware. The D2FW format and the IEC 62386-105 specification are developed by the International Electrotechnical Commission (IEC), in concert with the DALI Alliance.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Refer to your lighting control gear or control device's documentation
